question:
Find out the correct match.

| Disease | Pathogen | Main organ affected |
|---|---|---|
| (A) Filariasis | Common round worm | Small intestine |
| (B) Ringworm | Fungus | Skin |
| (C) Dysentery | Protozoa | Liver |
| (D) Typhoid | Bacteria | Lungs |
explanation: Ringworm is caused by fungi (Microsporum, Trichophyton) and affects the skin. Filariasis is caused by Filarial worms (Wuchereria). Typhoid affects the intestine.
